duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and execute strategic sourcing activities for all sourcing categories to optimize cost and reduce risk in the supply chain.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to provide guidance on procurement processes and support their sourcing needs.
Generate and track TCO savings achievements according to procurement annual goals and policies.
Promote forecasting levels of demand for raw materials in collaboration with Planning and Marketing to meet business needs.
Manage supplier performance through Quality and Business Reviews (QBR) and maintain supplier communications regularly.
Conduct research to ascertain the best products and suppliers in terms of best value, delivery schedules, and quality.
Forecast price trends and their impact on future purchase price fluctuations.
Develop the company's short to long term procurement strategy.
Manage and lead procurement/sourcing specialists day-to-day deliverables and ensure internal stakeholders' expectations/support are met accordingly.

education_certification.credential: BS in Supply Chain, Finance, Engineering, or equivalent; APICS certification desirable
